text: Nessler or Neßler is a German surname. Notable people with the surname include: *Brad Nessler (born 1956), American sportscaster *Julius Neßler (1827–1905), German chemist *Karl Nessler (1872–1951), German-born American inventor *Viktor Nessler (1841–1890), Alsatian composer ==See also== *Nessler cylinder, laboratory tubes with a fixed volume *Nesler Category:German- language surnames
title: Nessler
